sentences.sContent: Certainly no one in the media would deny the attraction of living behind a deep moat, even if it is filled with sharks.
sentences.sContent_eng: Certainly no one in the media would deny the attraction of living behind a deep moat, even if it is filled with sharks.
sentences.sCn: 当然，在媒体业，没有人会否认围在深深的护城河里面过日子的吸引力，即使那河里满是鲨鱼在游来游去。

sentences.sContent: The bridge lies like a trench in the fortress of the moat, which is shaped to blend in with the outlines of the landscape.
sentences.sContent_eng: The bridge lies like a trench in the fortress of the moat, which is shaped to blend in with the outlines of the landscape.
sentences.sCn: 这座桥就像是坐落在护城河中的一条沟渠，这种造型是为了使它与周围的风景融合在一起。

sentences.sContent: It's a shame our particular moat, the ashram of Pray, is so exhausting, because in the Love section Bardem proves himself a worthy castle.
sentences.sContent_eng: It's a shame our particular moat, the ashram of Pray, is so exhausting, because in the Love section Bardem proves himself a worthy castle.
sentences.sCn: 很遗憾，我们急缺实际的护城河，祈祷的场所，因为在爱这部分里，巴登证明了自己就是一座有价值的城堡。

trans.tranOther: a deep wide hole, usually filled with water, dug around a castle as a defence
